page.title: 02RODINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: {RODINGTON VILLAGE }IS A SMALL PLACE. IT HAS FEW PEOPLE. IT HAS A {POPULATION OF 564,}BUT IT IS BIG IN THE WAY THE HOUSES ARE SPREAD OUT.FROM ONE END OF THE VILLAGE TO THE OTHER END WOULD BE ABOUT THREE MILES. IN RODINGTON WE HAVE A{SHOP.}IT IS ALSO A POST OFFICE. WE HAVE A{PUB,}IT IS OPPOSITE THE SHOP. IT OPENS EVERY DAY. WE HAVE A{CHURCH,}IT IS A CHURCH OF ENGLAND CHURCH. IT IS CALLED ST. GEORGE'S CHURCH. THE CHURCH DOESN'T REALLY BELONG TO ANY ONE EXCEPT GOD. THE{VILLAGE HALL}IS OWNED BY THE VILLAGE AND IT IS USED BY EVERYBODY WHO LIVES IN THE VILLAGE. THERE IS A SMALL{SCHOOL}FOR CHILDREN FROM THE AGE OF FIVE TO ELEVEN. THE GOOD THING ABOUT RODINGTON IS THAT IT HAS LOTS OF COUNTRYSIDE AND SPACE SO IT IS NICE AND PEACEFUL AND YOU HAVE NOT GOT ALL THE HUSTLE AND BUSTLE OF THE TOWN.
